title: Blessing ceremony of Ven. Atapattukande Ananda Nayake Thera on Sunday
body_lines: The Executive Committee (Karaka Sangha Sabha) of the Malwatte Chapter has recently appointed Ven. Atapattukande Ananda Nayake Thera, as the Chief Adhikarana Sanghanayake for Southern Sri Lanka, coupled with the honorary title ‘Saddharma Keerthi Sri Dhammarathana Pragnatissa’. Details of awareness on the Blessing Ceremony to be held on Sunday 20 March at BMICH 2.30 p.m. were announced at a press conference yesterday at the Havelock Town ‘Sama’ Vihara. (From left): Nayake Padavi Padanothsava Committee Treasurer Shirani Wickramasinghe, Chief Communication Coordinator Sisira Wijesinghe, Chief Organiser Ven. Rammala Dhammarakkitha Thero, University of Colombo Chancellor Ven. Muruththettuwe Ananda Thero, Chief Adhikarana Sanghanayake for Southern Province Ven. Atapattukande Ananda Nayake Thera and Ven. Pallawala rahula theero of California Buddhi Vihara
